Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication to excellence. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750000, aiming to provide you with unparalleled value while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. We believe this offer presents an opportunity for both parties to benefit. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
